page.title: 19HOMELIFE ON ST.MARTINS I.O.S
page.content: My family own a flower farm and two holiday cottages which are let out in the tourist season.My Dad and my adult brother run the farm,and my Mum looks after the goats which provide our milk,and cleans the cottages.In the flower season when my parents are busy,I have to put the soup on to cook or I take my dinner down to my Mum,if she is too busy bunching the flowers. But when my big sister is home from college on the minland she cooks the meals.In the summer my Mum goes to the main island every Thursday to get the weekly shopping,because of the limited supplies in the island shop.We order most of our clothes from catalogues.My Dad likes walking.My Mum,sister,brother and I all like reading for our hobby.On Sundays in the summer we usually go walking or we go to the beach for a pinnic and swim.
